data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Saint John, Dominica so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saint John, Dominica
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Saint John to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.section_summary: On average, 5 babies will be born in the next month to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Saint John, Dominica.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Saint John.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Lord, there are 4,890 people in the state of Saint John who claim Christianity, but may have never read the Bible. Please challenge them today to read the Bible for themselves.
data.verse: All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Portsmouth
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Portsmouth, Saint John, Dominica.
Lord, please give the 1,188 believers in the state of Saint John the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the state of Saint John.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Saint John, Dominica to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.
